title: UK inflation cools markedly in January, boosting odds of Bank of England rate cut
summary_full: The U.K. inflation rate cooled to 3% in January, according to the latest figures from the Office for National Statistics (ONS).
summary_public: The U.K. inflation rate cooled to 3% in January, according to the latest figures from the Office for National Statistics (ONS).

GB.label: neutral
GB.evidence: UK inflation cools markedly in January, boosting odds of Bank of England rate cut
